Blah blah \citetext{\citealp[][pp. 33-35, 38-39]{Fis00a} and \emph{passim}}.

Blah blah \citetext{\citealp[][]{Meskin2007}, \citealp[][]{Fis00a}}

Inline \citet{Meskin2007} mentions something, and \citet{Fis00a} is also good reading
